name: ACC Cement
description: Durable cement perfect for high-performance concrete and masonry work.

name: Ambuja Cement
description: Eco-friendly cement known for superior strength and long-lasting structures.

name: UltraTech Cement
description: High-strength cement designed for RCC and high-rise structures.

name: Bharati Cement
description: Cement with consistent quality, ideal for general construction and masonry.

name: Birla Cement
description: Premium quality cement perfect for all types of construction work.

name: Double Bull Cement
description: Reliable cement offering superior workability and strength for construction projects.

name: Kashmir Cement
description: Affordable yet strong cement, ideal for residential and commercial structures.

name: Dalmia Cement
description: High-performance cement, offering excellent durability and strength.

name: Deccan Cement
description: Well-rounded cement suitable for general-purpose construction.

name: JSW Cement
description: High-quality cement with excellent workability and strength retention.

name: Priya Cement
description: Cost-effective cement ideal for both small and large construction projects.

name: Shree Cement
description: Cement that provides long-lasting durability and is perfect for RCC structures.

name: Sagar Cement
description: Affordable and reliable cement suitable for all types of construction projects.

name: South India Cement
description: Strong and durable cement ideal for residential and commercial construction.

name: Bhavya Cement
description: High-quality cement that ensures robust and durable structures.

name: Red Clay Brick
description: Traditional red clay bricks commonly used in Indian construction. Known for strength and durability, suitable for building load-bearing and non-load-bearing walls.

name: Fly Ash Brick
description: Eco-friendly fly ash bricks made from fly ash, cement, and sand. These bricks provide better thermal insulation and are a sustainable alternative to traditional clay bricks.

name: Concrete Hollow Block
description: High-strength hollow concrete blocks for constructing walls and foundations. Provides soundproofing and thermal insulation, often used in high-rise buildings.

name: AAC Block (Autoclaved Aerated Concrete)
description: Lightweight AAC blocks with superior heat and sound insulation properties. Ideal for constructing both residential and commercial buildings.

name: Solid Concrete Block
description: Solid concrete blocks with excellent load-bearing capacity. Commonly used for the construction of industrial and commercial buildings.

name: Copper Wire
description: High-conductivity copper wire used for electrical wiring in homes and industrial setups. Available in various gauges for different current capacities.

name: PVC Insulated Cable
description: Durable PVC insulated cables designed for household wiring, offering protection against fire, moisture, and wear.

name: Switch Socket Outlet
description: Standard 6A switch socket outlet for residential and commercial electrical connections. Designed with safety shutters to prevent accidental electric shock.

name: Circuit Breaker (MCB)
description: Miniature Circuit Breaker (MCB) used for automatic circuit disconnection in case of overload or short circuit. Essential for safety in homes and offices.

name: LED Bulb (12W)
description: Energy-efficient 12W LED bulb providing bright light while saving electricity. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: Electrical Conduit Pipe
description: PVC electrical conduit pipes used for routing and protecting electrical wiring in walls and ceilings. Flame retardant and impact resistant.

name: Distribution Board
description: A robust electrical distribution board for housing circuit breakers, RCDs, and other electrical components. Essential for safe power distribution in buildings.

name: Electrical Tape
description: Insulating electrical tape for bundling and protecting electrical wires. Flame resistant and available in multiple colors for easy identification.

name: Ceiling Fan
description: Energy-efficient ceiling fan with a 1200mm sweep. Provides superior air circulation with minimal noise.

name: Earthing Rod
description: Copper-coated earthing rod used for grounding electrical systems and providing safety from electrical faults.

name: Granite Stone
description: High-quality polished granite stone used for flooring, countertops, and wall cladding. Known for its durability and resistance to wear and tear.

name: Marble Stone
description: Premium grade white marble stone, ideal for flooring, tabletops, and decorative pieces. Offers a smooth and elegant finish.

name: Sandstone
description: Durable sandstone with a natural, earthy appearance. Used for patios, driveways, and outdoor cladding. Offers a slip-resistant surface.

name: Slate Stone
description: Natural slate stone with a textured finish, perfect for roofing, flooring, and wall applications. Known for its resistance to weathering.

name: Limestone
description: Smooth limestone stone, ideal for flooring, wall cladding, and decorative stonework. Offers a soft color palette and is easy to cut and shape.

name: Travertine Stone
description: A classic natural stone used for flooring and walls. Known for its porous surface and subtle color variations, ideal for both interior and exterior applications.

name: Quartzite
description: Extremely hard natural stone, perfect for countertops, stairs, and outdoor paving. It has a beautiful crystal-like appearance and high durability.

name: Cobblestone
description: Durable cobblestone made from natural stone, commonly used for paving streets, driveways, and pathways. It provides a rustic and historic look.

name: Onyx Stone
description: Luxurious natural onyx stone, used for high-end interior decor such as wall panels, countertops, and lighting features. Known for its translucency and unique color patterns.

name: Basalt Stone
description: Highly durable basalt stone, ideal for outdoor use in paving, cladding, and landscaping. Known for its dark color and weather resistance.

name: Acrylic Emulsion Paint
description: High-quality acrylic emulsion paint for interior walls, offering a smooth, matte finish. Provides excellent coverage and durability.

name: Oil-Based Enamel Paint
description: Durable oil-based enamel paint ideal for doors, windows, and metal surfaces. Offers a glossy finish and is resistant to chipping and weathering.

name: Exterior Emulsion Paint
description: Weatherproof exterior emulsion paint designed to withstand harsh outdoor conditions. Provides UV protection and resists cracking and fading.

name: Textured Wall Paint
description: Premium textured wall paint for interior walls, adding depth and dimension to your decor. Available in various patterns and finishes.

name: Wood Varnish
description: Clear wood varnish offering a durable and glossy finish to wooden surfaces. Protects wood from moisture and UV damage while enhancing its natural color.

name: Primer (Water-Based)
description: Water-based primer for interior and exterior walls, providing a strong base for painting. Ensures better paint adhesion and long-lasting results.

name: Polyurethane(PU) Finish
description: High-gloss polyurethane (PU) finish for wood and metal surfaces, providing excellent scratch resistance and a luxurious appearance.

name: Cement Paint
description: Durable cement-based paint for exterior surfaces like walls and concrete structures. Provides water resistance and is ideal for outdoor use.

name: Distemper Paint
description: Cost-effective distemper paint for interior walls, offering a matte finish. Suitable for low-traffic areas and budget-friendly painting projects.

name: Lacquer Finish
description: Glossy lacquer finish for wood and furniture, providing a smooth and shiny surface. Quick-drying and resistant to scratches and water.

name: PVC Pipe (3/4 inch)
description: Durable 3/4 inch PVC pipe for water supply systems. Lightweight and resistant to corrosion, ideal for both indoor and outdoor plumbing.

name: Brass Ball Valve
description: High-quality brass ball valve for controlling water flow in plumbing systems. Suitable for residential and commercial applications.

name: CPVC Pipe (1 inch)
description: Heat-resistant CPVC pipe for hot and cold water plumbing systems. Highly durable and designed to withstand higher temperatures.

name: Bathroom Faucet
description: Sleek chrome-plated bathroom faucet for sinks. Designed with a single lever for easy water temperature control.

name: PVC Elbow Joint (90 Degree)
description: Durable 90-degree PVC elbow joint for redirecting pipes in plumbing systems. Ideal for water supply lines and drainage systems.

name: Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink
description: Stainless steel kitchen sink with a smooth finish and sound-absorbing pads. Resistant to rust and corrosion.

name: PPR Pipe (1/2 inch)
description: Polypropylene Random (PPR) pipe for both hot and cold water plumbing systems. Offers high pressure and temperature resistance.

name: Hand Shower Set
description: Hand shower set with adjustable spray patterns and anti-clog nozzles. Easy to install and maintain, providing a luxurious bathing experience.

name: UPVC Pipe (2 inch)
description: Unplasticized PVC (UPVC) pipe for drainage and sewage systems. Resistant to chemicals and corrosion, suitable for waste disposal systems.

name: Cast Iron Floor Drain
description: Heavy-duty cast iron floor drain for effective water drainage in bathrooms and basements. Rust-resistant and durable.

name: River Sand
description: Fine river sand used for plastering and masonry work. Known for its smooth texture and consistent quality.

name: M-Sand (Manufactured Sand)
description: Crushed stone sand, also known as M-Sand, used as a substitute for river sand in concrete production and brick laying. Offers good durability and strength.

name: Coarse Aggregate (20mm)
description: 20mm coarse aggregate used for concrete production, providing strength and durability to the mixture. Sourced from high-quality crushed stones.

name: Fine Aggregate
description: High-quality fine aggregate, suitable for producing high-grade concrete and mortar. Helps in achieving a smooth finish.

name: Crushed Stone (40mm)
description: 40mm crushed stone aggregate used for road construction, driveways, and drainage applications. Known for its strength and load-bearing capacity.

name: Gravel (10mm)
description: 10mm gravel commonly used for concrete mixes and as a decorative stone for landscaping projects. Provides good drainage properties.

name: Crushed Granite Aggregate
description: High-quality crushed granite aggregate used for concrete, road construction, and as a base material for pavers and driveways.

name: Limestone Aggregate
description: Limestone aggregate used in road construction, concrete production, and landscaping projects. Known for its durability and natural appearance.

name: Pea Gravel
description: Small rounded pea gravel used in garden pathways, patios, and drainage systems. Provides a decorative touch and good drainage.

name: Stone Dust
description: Fine stone dust, a byproduct of crushed stones, used in construction as a filler material for leveling and compacting surfaces.

name: Ceramic Wall Tile
description: Glossy ceramic wall tiles designed for bathrooms and kitchens. Resistant to stains and easy to clean.

name: Porcelain Floor Tile
description: Durable porcelain tiles with a matte finish, suitable for high-traffic areas such as living rooms and hallways. Scratch and water-resistant.

name: Vitrified Tile
description: Polished vitrified tiles ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. Known for its strength, low porosity, and shiny surface.

name: Mosaic Tile
description: Colorful mosaic tiles for decorative purposes, perfect for creating accent walls, borders, and splashbacks.

name: Glass Tile
description: Glossy glass tiles for kitchen backsplashes and bathroom walls. Available in a variety of colors and finishes.

name: Subway Tile
description: Classic white subway tiles for modern and minimalistic interiors. Often used in kitchens and bathrooms for a clean look.

name: Terracotta Tile
description: Natural terracotta tiles, perfect for rustic interiors and exteriors. Known for their earthy tones and heat resistance.

name: Marble Tile
description: Luxurious marble tiles for high-end interiors. Suitable for flooring and walls, offering a premium and elegant look.

name: Granite Tile
description: Durable granite tiles for floors, countertops, and staircases. Resistant to scratches and perfect for heavy-use areas.

name: Wooden Finish Tile
description: Wooden finish porcelain tiles that mimic the look of natural wood. Perfect for adding warmth to living spaces without the maintenance of real wood.

name: TMT Steel Bar (8mm)
description: High-quality 8mm TMT steel bar used for small-scale construction projects. Offers excellent tensile strength and corrosion resistance.

name: TMT Steel Bar (10mm)
description: 10mm TMT steel bar ideal for residential construction and reinforced concrete structures. Known for its flexibility and durability.

name: TMT Steel Bar (12mm)
description: 12mm TMT steel bar used in multi-storey buildings and large infrastructure projects. Offers high strength-to-weight ratio.

name: TMT Steel Bar (16mm)
description: Durable 16mm TMT steel bar, perfect for heavy-duty construction such as bridges, flyovers, and commercial buildings.

name: TMT Steel Bar (20mm)
description: 20mm TMT steel bar designed for large structural projects like dams and industrial buildings. Provides high tensile and yield strength.

name: TMT Steel Bar (25mm)
description: 25mm TMT steel bar for high-rise constructions and heavy infrastructure projects. Offers superior load-bearing capacity and anti-corrosion properties.

name: TMT Steel Bar (32mm)
description: Premium 32mm TMT steel bar, suitable for extremely large structures like bridges and heavy foundations. Provides maximum strength and flexibility.

name: TMT Steel Bar (40mm)
description: 40mm TMT steel bar used in massive infrastructure projects. Known for its ability to bear heavy loads and withstand seismic activity.

name: Corrosion Resistant TMT Bar (12mm)
description: 12mm corrosion-resistant TMT bar ideal for marine and coastal construction projects, offering superior protection against rust and corrosion.

name: Earthquake Resistant TMT Bar (16mm)
description: 16mm earthquake-resistant TMT bar designed to absorb seismic shocks, making it ideal for construction in earthquake-prone areas.

name: Teak Wood Planks
description: High-quality teak wood planks, ideal for furniture making and flooring. Known for its durability, resistance to decay, and fine grain.

name: Plywood Sheet (19mm)
description: 19mm thick plywood sheet for use in furniture, cabinetry, and interior paneling. Made from layers of wood veneers bonded together with strong adhesives.

name: MDF Board
description: Medium-density fiberboard (MDF) used in furniture and decorative moldings. Smooth surface suitable for painting or veneering.

name: Hardwood Veneer
description: Natural hardwood veneer sheets used to create a wooden surface finish for furniture and cabinets. Offers a rich, authentic wooden texture.

name: Walnut Wood Logs
description: Premium walnut wood logs used for high-end furniture and interior decoration. Valued for its rich, dark color and grain pattern.

name: Bamboo Ply
description: Eco-friendly bamboo ply sheets used in furniture, partitions, and decor. Known for its strength, sustainability, and natural aesthetics.

name: Oak Wood Planks
description: Solid oak wood planks ideal for flooring, furniture, and joinery. Renowned for its hardness, grain pattern, and durability.

name: Blockboard (25mm)
description: 25mm blockboard made from softwood core sandwiched between plywood layers. Commonly used in doors, shelves, and partitions.

name: Pine Wood
description: Lightweight pine wood used for interior furniture, wall paneling, and flooring. Known for its affordability and easy workability.

name: Engineered Wood Flooring
description: Pre-finished engineered wood flooring with a top layer of natural wood veneer. Offers the beauty of wood with enhanced durability and stability.
